title: [CLIENT] Old Dr. Mundo Icons Showing
body:
When selecting Dr. Mundo's champion page, on his Overview and Abilities tab, the icons for his W and E abilities are the old, outdated icons rather then the current ones. 

1. Open Client and log in.
2. Go to Profile then Champions
3. Click Dr. Mundo and open his page to Overview and/or Abilities.

This bug is persistent and constant. Restarting the client or closing and re-opening the Dr. Mundo page does not fix it.

replies.body:
Hey MadDoughnutz,

Thanks for the report!

Katey, no offense or anything, but did you guys notice this only just now? Pretty sure that it's been like that since Mundo's release. :P
(Again, just asking, cause I thought it was one of those widely known ancient bugs that Riot were always aware of, despite the fact that it hasn't been fixed yet.)
Nope, the team is aware - there's a ticket in for it. This isn't an area I'd personally handle, but wanted to drop in and let MadDoughnutz we're aware of it.
It's been like this at least since i started playing, and that was when zed was new.
It's been like this since I started playing when Yasuo came out. I'm amazed it's lasted this long honestly.
